revised_title: Obituary of Sir George Airy: A Pioneering Mathematician and Astronomer
tldr: The obituary of Sir George Airy, a renowned mathematician and astronomer, highlights his significant contributions to various scientific fields, including his work on the figure of the Earth, lunar theory, and optical subjects. Airy's life and achievements are celebrated, emphasizing his impact on the scientific community and the knowledge we owe to him.
